COMPANY OVERVIEW

Company Name: Web On Dev
Legal Name: Web On Dev

Vision: To be the global leader in innovative software solutions that drive business growth.

Team Size: 50+ professionals
Projects Completed: 500+
Countries Served: 50+
Client Satisfaction Rating: 4.9/5

================================================================================
CORE SERVICES
================================================================================

1. WEB DEVELOPMENT
   - Custom Web Applications (Next.js, React, Vue.js, Angular)
   - WordPress Development & Customization
   - Headless CMS Development (Contentful, Sanity, Strapi)
   - E-commerce Development (Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento)
   - Progressive Web Apps (PWA)
   - API Development & Integration
   - Web Portal Development
   - Pricing: $3,000 - $100,000+ depending on complexity
   - Timeline: 2-16 weeks

2. MOBILE APP DEVELOPMENT
   - iOS Native Development (Swift, SwiftUI)
   - Android Native Development (Kotlin, Java)
   - Cross-Platform Development (React Native, Flutter)
   - Mobile App UI/UX Design
   - App Store Optimization (ASO)
   - Mobile Backend Development
   - Pricing: $10,000 - $150,000+
   - Timeline: 8-24 weeks

3. UI/UX DESIGN
   - User Research & Analysis
   - Wireframing & Prototyping
   - Visual Design
   - Design Systems
   - Accessibility (WCAG 2.1 AA)
   - Usability Testing
   - Interaction Design
   - Pricing: $2,000 - $25,000+
   - Timeline: 2-8 weeks

4. DIGITAL MARKETING
   - Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
   - Pay-Per-Click Advertising (PPC)
   - Social Media Marketing
   - Content Marketing
   - Email Marketing
   - Conversion Rate Optimization
   - Analytics & Reporting
   - Pricing: $1,000 - $10,000+ per month

5. E-COMMERCE SOLUTIONS
   - Shopify Store Development
   - WooCommerce Development
   - Custom E-commerce Platforms
   - Payment Gateway Integration
   - Inventory Management Systems
   - Multi-vendor Marketplace Development
   - Pricing: $5,000 - $75,000+

6. CLOUD & DEVOPS
   - AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Services
   - CI/CD Pipeline Setup
   - Container Orchestration (Docker, Kubernetes)
   - Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, Pulumi)
   - Cloud Migration
   - 24/7 Monitoring & Support
   - Pricing: Custom based on infrastructure

7. CUSTOM SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT
   - Enterprise Applications
   - SaaS Product Development
   - Legacy System Modernization
   - Third-party Integrations
   - Database Design & Optimization
   - Pricing: $20,000 - $500,000+

TECHNOLOGY STACK
================================================================================

FRONTEND:
- React.js, Next.js 14+
- Vue.js, Nuxt.js
- Angular
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS, Shadcn UI
- Framer Motion

BACKEND:
- Node.js, Express.js
- Python, Django, FastAPI
- PHP, Laravel
- Go, Rust
- Java, Spring Boot

DATABASES:
- PostgreSQL
- MongoDB
- MySQL
- Redis
- Supabase, Firebase

CLOUD & INFRASTRUCTURE:
- AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS)
- Google Cloud Platform
- Microsoft Azure
- Vercel, Netlify
- DigitalOcean

DEVOPS:
- Docker, Kubernetes
- GitHub Actions, GitLab CI
- Terraform, Pulumi
- Nginx, Apache

CMS & E-COMMERCE:
- WordPress, Headless WordPress
- Shopify, Shopify Plus
- WooCommerce
- Contentful, Sanity, Strapi

- Website Maintenance: $200 - $1,000/month

FREE SERVICES:

PROCESS & METHODOLOGY
================================================================================

1. DISCOVERY & PLANNING

   - Stakeholder interviews
   - Technical feasibility analysis
   - Project scope definition
   - Timeline and budget estimation

2. DESIGN
   - User research and personas
   - Information architecture
   - Wireframing
   - Visual design
   - Prototype development
   - Design review and iterations

3. DEVELOPMENT
   - Agile/Scrum methodology
   - Sprint planning and execution
   - Daily standups
   - Code reviews
   - Continuous integration

4. TESTING & QA
   - Unit testing
   - Integration testing
   - User acceptance testing
   - Performance testing
   - Security testing

5. DEPLOYMENT
   - Staging environment setup
   - Production deployment
   - Performance optimization
   - Documentation

6. SUPPORT & MAINTENANCE
   - 24/7 monitoring
   - Regular updates
   - Bug fixes
   - Feature enhancements
   - Performance optimization

================================================================================
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
================================================================================

Q: What is your typical project timeline?
A: Timelines vary by project complexity. Simple websites take 2-4 weeks, business websites 4-8 weeks, web applications 8-16 weeks, and enterprise solutions 16-52+ weeks.

Q: Do you work with international clients?
A: Yes, we serve clients in 50+ countries including USA, UK, Canada, Australia, Germany, UAE, and more. We work across all time zones.

Q: What technologies do you specialize in?
A: We specialize in modern web technologies including Next.js, React, Node.js, Python, PostgreSQL, AWS, and more. We choose the best tech stack for each project.

Q: Do you provide post-launch support?
A: Yes, we offer comprehensive maintenance and support packages including bug fixes, security updates, performance monitoring, and feature enhancements.

Q: How do you handle project communication?
A: We use Slack, Microsoft Teams, or your preferred communication tool. Regular meetings, progress reports, and transparent project management via Jira or similar tools.

Q: What is your payment structure?
A: Typically 30% upfront, 40% at development milestones, and 30% upon completion. We also offer monthly retainer options for ongoing projects.

Q: Can you sign an NDA?
A: Yes, we routinely sign NDAs and respect client confidentiality. Data security and privacy are paramount.

Q: Do you offer white-label services?
A: Yes, we offer white-label development services for agencies and businesses.
